name: Dina
info:
• 简体中文名: 蒂娜
  • 性别: 女
  • 引用来源: https://thelastofus.fandom.com/wiki/Dina
detail:
Dina is a character who appears in The Last of Us Part II. She is voiced and motion-captured by Shannon Woodward.

A few days after the end of Dina and Jesse's relationship, there was a celebration in a church within the settlement. Dina danced with a man from the group, much to the jealousy of her ex-boyfriend. She invited Ellie, who was drinking at the bar, to dance with her. While dancing, Dina kissed Ellie, remarking that the other boys in the village should be "terrified" because Ellie has more of a chance with Dina than they do.

jobs.name: The Last of Us: Part II
